data.text: #WeatherUpdate: Due to bad weather (heavy rain) in Chennai (MAA), all departures/arrivals and their consequential flights may get affected. Passengers are requested to keep a check on their flight status via https://t.co/VkU7yLjZly.
@ShakVtest Hi Shakil, kindly DM us your PNR so we may check the details. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@varun_pisces93 Hi Varun, we are in receipt of your email. We have updated our team to check and get back with an update soon.

@BharathulaShri Hi Shri, please note that we have processed a refund on 07th Nov 22 and initiated the cancellation charge refund towards the agency ID. Further, we request you to contact your travel agency after 20 days for cancellation charge refund claims.
@hlivenews Welcome!
@Touseef_Turkey Hi Touseef, we are working on your concern. Further, we are in receipt of your email. Please allow us some time, we shall get back with an update soon.
@swikargupta Hi Swikar, kindly advise the name of the passenger on the booking via DM so we may assist further in this regard.https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@a4abhijeet_ Abhijeet, you are welcome!
@a4abhijeet_ Hi Abhijeet, please note we have refunded the amount INR 8398/- towards the agency ID on 30th Oct 22. We request you to kindly connect with the agency for refund claims.

@hlivenews Hi Team, this is fake. Any person approaching such unscrupulous person(s) for job/employment with Spice Jet Ltd. for consideration shall do so at their own risk, cost, and consequence. Kindly refer to https://t.co/y5mvBqFmxM for more information.
@paulsaptarshi1 Hi Saptarshi, we're rapidly expanding our network. We shall definitely look into the potential the option holds. Stay tuned with us for updates.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Gaming Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to offline and online games such as gaming consoles, tabletop games, video game publishers

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Fields of study
domain.description: for all fields of study, e.g., futurology, microbiology

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Ju-Leh to good times!
Thank you for the lovely capture Cham ✨

@PARAMJE77819575 Paramjeet, as checked, Ok to Board has been updated for 2 passengers in your booking.
@Praveen43471893 Praveen, as checked, the refund is already under process and shall be credited to your account at the earliest.

RT @Sandeshsuryava9: @flyspicejet A wonderful gesture and honesty shown by Mr. Vinayak Bhosale.

I forgot the electronic device on the plan…

urls.title: SpiceJet
urls.description: Our employees are trained to assist our differently-abled passengers and for any sorts of limitations, we offer a wide variety of special assistance. You can obtain information in advance regarding the assistance we offer, either through this website or by contacting our Reservations on +91-124-4983410 / +91-124-7101600. Please be aware that there might be unpredictable circumstances such as weather or mechanical problems that may call for a last minute unavoidable change, but we will do our best to
